availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Headed by the Secretary of State. Appointed by the Governor of Kentucky under the 1850 Kentucky Constitution. Secretary of State: Thomas B. Monroe, Jr; Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.; Daniel C. Wickliffe; and Ephraim L. Van Winkle.

bibl.p: “Office of the Secretary of State,” The Kentucky Encyclopedia, ed. John E. Kleber (Lexington: University Press of Kentucky, 1992), 807; “Secretaries of State,” (http://apps.sos.ky.gov/secdesk/sosinfo/default.aspx) (accessed February 13, 2017).
